name: daily-leetcode-fetcher
description: Enhanced LeetCode daily problem fetcher with full mathematical notation support and complete descriptions

scripts.test:valid-sudoku: npm run build && node test-simple.js valid-sudoku
scripts.test:spiral-matrix: npm run build && node test-simple.js spiral-matrix
scripts.test:game-of-life: npm run build && node test-simple.js game-of-life
scripts.test:rotate-image: npm run build && node test-simple.js rotate-image
scripts.test:set-matrix-zeroes: npm run build && node test-simple.js set-matrix-zeroes
scripts.test:search-a-2d-matrix: npm run build && node test-simple.js search-a-2d-matrix
